Airbomber sees something fall in the distance and runs to the position.

"O=
h my God! By Primus itself, what are you doing! Are you hurt?" Airbomber gr=
abbed Drazom and pulled him, trying to pull him out of the water...
  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

  Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 4:20 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  *Draz=
om lays there still losing mech fluid and he rolls over to the side and fal=
ls off the ledge. He misses the spiky rocks below and falls into a river. I=
t washes him to a rock and he grabs on to it pulls himself out of the water=
* Drazom:.....sweet......Mantella......... *Drazom quietly says as he gets =
colder and colder. A tear runs out of Drazom's eye as he thinks of how diff=
erent this could have been...but it wasn't... Drazom just lays there waitin=
g to waste away..He see's a praying mantus walk by and he punches hisself i=
n the face*
